programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water
programme.desc: The Zambezi is one of Africa's most influential rivers. It supports some of the continent's most spectacular wildlife. However, the Zambezi's long and winding journey destroys, as well as creates.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Lake Turkana: Land of the Crocodile
programme.desc: The largest of Africa's Rift valley lakes, Lake Turkana is at the heart of one of the harshest landscapes on the planet. Despite its hostile environment, man and beast have both worked out a way to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: A dour production of Shakespeare’s play produced for German TV. A prince returns home for his father’s funeral and doesn’t like what he finds.

programme.title: Swamp Diamonds
programme.desc: An undercover police woman infiltrates a group of hardened female criminals who plan to break out of prison and retrieve diamonds from a swamp.

programme.title: The Wild Wild World of Batwoman

programme.title: Cat in the Hat

programme.desc: During a weekend trip to the mountains, Mary finds herself at the now run-down lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up. She becomes determined to restore the building to its former glory

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Journey
programme.desc: Follow the annual migration through more hazards and dangers.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: The Chase
programme.desc: The Chase" focuses on Africa’s predators and how they hunt -- from cheetahs running down gazelles to lions taking on the mighty buffalo. Even the best hunters can be outrun and outwitted.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Migration
programme.desc: Great herds take center stage as what’s at stake is revealed for those with no home but the ground they find themselves standing on. The herds run the gamut of predators, as well as pressures unique to this nomadic way of life.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: The Hunt
programme.desc: The Hunt" focuses on hunters and hunting, and the brutal ending of a life -- an act which sustains another’s. The hunt is by far the most dramatic event taking place on the plains of the Serengeti.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Protection
programme.desc: Animals use all sorts of strategies to protect their families and food from marauders.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Explore the rivers and lakes contained within the Serengeti eco-system and examine those whose lives are controlled by the presence -- or lack -- of life-giving water.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: River Giants
programme.desc: Explore the river environment of the enormous Nile crocodiles and hippopotamus.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Family
programme.desc: Explore the many different concepts of family in the natural world. See how animals get together, raising of cubs and chicks, and learn how family bonds can determine an animal’s fate.

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Defense
programme.desc: Defense" explores defensive strategies that include the most powerful instinct -- a mother’s love, which helps protect the next generation. This act of self-sacrifice, or risk of harm, typifies a mother’s defense of her offspring.

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges: The Humber Bridge
programme.desc: Rob Bell tells the story of the Humber Bridge.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Bannockburn
programme.desc: Robert the Bruce's victory against the English in June 1314.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Hastings
programme.desc: The Battle of Hastings ended Anglo-Saxon rule in England.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Watling Street
programme.desc: Boudicca's uprising against the Romans in 60-61AD.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Bosworth Field
programme.desc: The battle that ended the Wars of the Roses.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 25
programme.desc: Tonight, the remaining teams find themselves in Ingham, a small quintessential sugar cane town. Their challenge is to create sweet treats for the town's annual Harvest Festival using an ingredient the locals know best, sugar!

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 26
programme.desc: The teams are in for a shock when they're told they will be shopping for ingredients at roadside stalls and local markets.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 27
programme.desc: Thomas & Carla vs. Megan & Andy. It's the last chance of survival for two teams tonight in the tropical style sudden death cook-off. The heat is on as the temperatures rise in the kitchen. At the end of it all, one team will be going home.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 28
programme.desc: Everyone is back at Kitchen Headquarters and tonight's challenge requires the teams to prepare a seafood banquet fit for kings and the guests of honour are the most important people they will ever cook for - surprise VIPs.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 29
programme.desc: Tonight, it's an episode full of surprise tests and temptations. First up, teams begin to cook with their most difficult ingredients used yet, but soon the tables are turned.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Patterns Of Guilt
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Blind Trust
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Remnant of Blame
programme.desc: The solution to the most heinous crimes often hinge on the smallest of clues. Investigators must have their eyes trained to find the full story of a murder written in a single scrap of evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Critical Evidence
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: A Federal Offense
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack  whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons  the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two teams must create their own menus for the evening service. Despite a lacklustre selection, the female team threatens to outshine the men when it comes to food service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs create ethnic dishes with select ingredients; a team falls behind before dinner service begins.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates with a blind taste test; Ramsay presents an unexpected challenge in order to determine who gets immunnity.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chef with the best dish earns immunity; the chefs prepare a meal for TV host Maria Menounos and actor Jeremy Sisto; one team's service flags during dinner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the contestants' ability to communicate and work together with a three entrée relay race, with the winners getting a helicopter tour and a caviar tasting.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel let's loose on an abandoned 70's trike kit and works his magic to turn the naysayers into believers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a 1923 C-Cab and a client with hoarder tendencies. Pulling out all the stops, Ian attempts to create a vintage style tow truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The Drovers girls race to prevent a tragedy when they learn Ingrid plans to kill her ex-husband. However, Ingrid disappears under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Moira's star performance in the Gungellan musical is overshadowed by personal tragedy. Meanwhile, Marcus is dangerously obsessed with tracking down Ingrid.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Drovers Run faces its biggest crisis ever, and only a massive cattle drove will save Drovers from financial ruin, but have they left it too late? The search for Ingrid continues and a massive grain silo explodes with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tayler's mum Jane comes back to Drovers but Tayler doesn't want to see her; Ingrid moves in with Marcus; Lily tells Frank she wants to live with her mother.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tess Silverman arrives in the country after nearly 20 years in the city with dreams of selling off her share of the family ranch, Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ducks On The Pond
programme.desc: Tess tries to realize some cash from Drovers Run without hurting Claire. One of the shearers Claire hired disappears; did he leave because his wife was in labor, or was he murdered?

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead & Breakfast
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates a 19thcentury Bed and Breakfast in Red Boiling Springs, Tennessee, built by the Cloyd family.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hollywood Horror Stories
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hollywood, California to investigate the infamous Black Dahlia murder at the historic Sowden House.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Please Sign the Ghostbook
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS stays close to home and investigatesthe Lamda Chi Fraternity House at the University ofRhode Island, where a little girl reportedly fell to her death, and whose eerie presence is still feltin the house.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Storm
programme.desc: Buffalo's Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Old Dogs
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalo's newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Checkflight
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Second Chances
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Big Plans, Bad Luck
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day. Prefkar escapes Hay River courier duty. Cory finds an original bracket for the DC3 static line for Mikey's D-Day jump.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Nemesis
programme.desc: With his family working like a well-oiled machine, Jerry goes after a big contract offered up by a local car dealer.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Big House
programme.desc: Rev and family rally around JoJo after he gets busted for possession of marijuana.

programme.title: Run's House: The Secret of My Excess
programme.desc: The boys' wastefulness triggers a cleaning rampage by Rev. Meanwhile, Russy gets obsessive about training for his blue belt in karate.

programme.title: Run's House: Blog Wild
programme.desc: Rev tricks the girls into coming back East for work so that he and Justine can spend time with them. JoJo helps Diggy bring more traffic to his blog.

programme.title: Run's House: Tapper's Delight
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela nurture Russy's new passion: tap dancing. Diggy plays his sisters into getting him a mini-fridge for his bedroom. Rev tries to babyproof the house.

programme.title: Run's House: An Office He Can't Refuse
programme.desc: Rev tries to become an office worker at the remarkable Global Grind. Diggy's clean freak behavior borders on germaphobia.

programme.title: Run's House: Mother Smother
programme.desc: Diggy and Russy get annoyed by their Mom getting in their business while older siblings Angela and Vanessa don't mind Justine's ways. JoJo helps Rev find a new wardrobe.

programme.title: Run's House: The Puppy Whisperer
programme.desc: Justine and the boys try to train their dog Pal to convince Rev they're worthy of another dog. JoJo cooks healthy fried chicken for his parents.

programme.title: Run's House: Hall of Fame
programme.desc: Rev tries to figure out what Run DMC getting inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame is all about. Angela and Vanessa celebrate the 2-year anniversary for Pastry.

programme.title: Run's House: Series Premiere
programme.desc: Daughter Angela is graduating from high school, and Run plans to reward her for being a straight-A student and the family's "role model" by throwing her a party.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Don't You Want Me Baby?
programme.desc: When Toni revisits the past, it could destroy her future with Todd.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Merry Ex-Mas
programme.desc: Maya claims she’s over Darnell – but is she?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?

programme.title: On the Case: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman is murdered the evidence points detectives to a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Quantum Leap

programme.title: Quantum Leap

programme.title: Quantum Leap

programme.title: Quantum Leap

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Albert the Observer (Dean Stockwell) and Sam Beckett (Scott Bakula) have done a simultaneous leap, which means that they have changed places due to being struck by lightning.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the world’s most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's First Sleepover/Arthur's New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Have you ever been afraid of the dark? Despite D.W.'s threat of aliens, Arthur sets his tent for his first sleepover. Then, what exactly happens at midnight, December 31st? There are plenty of rumors, but no one seems to know for sure.

programme.title: Arthur: Tales of Grotesquely Grim Bunny/Pet Projects
programme.desc: When the comic book store changes owners, the new darker comics are right up Fern's alley, but Arthur can't seem to stomach them. Arthur and Francine enter their pets to compete against each other in the "Perfect Pet" video contest.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Rides The Bandwagon/Dad's Dessert Dilemma
programme.desc: Woogles have their own names and personalities and they're so darned cute! And Arthur's gotta have one, especially now that everyone is collecting them. Arthur wouldn't mind if Dad's infamous dessert "experiments" remained a family secret.

programme.title: Arthur: 1001 Dads/Prunella's Prediction
programme.desc: When Buster insists that he will miss the Father's Day picnic because he has other plans, Arthur is convinced that he's really sad and embarrassed about his parents’ divorce. And Prunella predicts a gift of flashpants, the hot new fashion.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Birthday/Francine Frensky, Superstar
programme.desc: Only four more days until Arthur's birthday party! But to Arthur's horror, it turns out Muffy's having her birthday party on the very same day. And, now that Francine finally has the lead in a school play, she's has become a stage tyrant.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Makes Waves/It Came From Beyond
programme.desc: With the community pool closed for repairs and the temperature on the rise, Arthur and D.W. need a place to keep cool. Then, Grandma Thora takes in a stray: an adorable little dog named...Killer?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: What's Cooking?/Buster's Special Delivery
programme.desc: Celebrity chef Ming Tsai is judging Lakewood Elementary's first-ever cooking contest, and Arthur thinks he has a shot at winning. Then, Buster volunteers to deliver the school mail and finds out that his new job is actually hard work!

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The 1920s and 30s were uncertain times for the RAF as well as all other armed services. With peace came cuts in spending on new aircraft development.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The series begins before WWI when military commanders struggled to understand what uses aviation might have. The Wright Brothers had been the first to fly a powered aircraft in controlled flight in 1903, but even by 1914 aircraft were still underpowered.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Franz Stangl & Gustav Wagner
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Nazi hunter Simon Wiesenthal tracked down fugitive war criminal Franz Stangl in Brazil. Stangl was responsible for the murder of over 800,000 people.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Paul Touvier
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how French investigators hunted down Paul Touvier a pro-Nazi sympathizer who was responsible for murdering both Jews and resistance fighters.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Kurt Lischka
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters looks at how German housewife Beate Klarsfeld and her husband Serge helped track down former Paris Gestapo chief Kurt Lishka. Lishka ordered the arrest and murder of over 33,000 Jews.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Cassie & Steve
programme.desc: Cassie was on a downward spiral until she got a friend request from a rapper named Steve. Two and a half years later, Cassie and Steve are engaged - but they have yet to meet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rod & Ebony
programme.desc: Rod met Ebony on a dating web site four years ago, now it's time for the two to meet in person. Is Ebony who she says she is? What will happen when they meet in real life for the first time?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Divorcee Shawny calls Nev and Max to help uncover the shadowy identity of her attempt at new love. But things get interesting as they discover that Shawny may have secrets of her own. (S6, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Falesha & Jacqueline
programme.desc: Falesha's name and pictures were stolen by a fake profile that nearly ruined her life. She thought her troubles were behind her, but four years later her past comes back to haunt her. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Dylan receives an anonymous text warning him that his online love, Ally, is not who she says she is. After the mystery texter is revealed, Nev and Max uncover a huge web of deceit! (S6, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Harold & Armani
programme.desc: Harold found his match with a beautiful fellow jock named Armani. Although they live in the same area, they've never met. Nev is joined by Angel Haze to help Harold get his perfect girl. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 113
programme.desc: Kris tries to woo his best friend Lauren with a special love song. Rachel musters the courage to tell Billy how she really feels.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 114

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 115
programme.desc: Arty Krystal confesses her love to unsuspecting friend Nishell. Mike tells gal pal Rachel that he's in love with her.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 116
programme.desc: Alex tells his best friend's sister that he has strong feelings for her. Asha tells her friend Chris that she wants more than friendship.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 117
programme.desc: Aja confesses her feelings to best friend Charles. Paulie tries to convince his friend Bethany that there is more between them that just friendship!

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 118
programme.desc: Danielle loves to laugh and joke with Chris, but now she wants to get serious with him. Jenni met Christie about a year ago and now she's ready to bare her heart.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 119
programme.desc: Nicole wants to make her best friend of a year and a half her boyfriend. Andrew and Sarah have been friends for 5 years now he's ready to reveal his true feelings.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 120
programme.desc: Franklin needs to let Erica, his friend of 5 years, know how he really feels about her. Wayne, a rapper, reveals his true feelings to Megan.

programme.title: The Hills: You Did This / It's About Trust
programme.desc: Lauren is enraged to learn that Audrina believed speculation that she and Justin were involved with each other. Heidi struggles balancing her relationships with Holly and Spencer. (S4, ep16)

programme.title: The Hills: Dream Boy, Dream Job / Mr. & Mrs. Pratt
programme.desc: Whitney gets offered a chance at her dream job in New York. Lauren grows nostalgic when she learns her parents are selling their house in Laguna Beach. (S4, ep18)

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Go Fish!

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: Gene Morrison – Fraudulent Forensics Expert

programme.title: 72 Hours: Predator

programme.title: 72 Hours: Monster of Miramichi
programme.desc: Firemen are called to a blaze and discover two sisters, one dead and the other on death's door. Detectives learn that a man snuck in and brutally sexually assaulted the sisters before setting fire to the house.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Vanished

programme.title: 72 Hours: Lust

programme.title: 72 Hours: Hostage
programme.desc: A man robs an armoured car at gunpoint and holds a massage parlor worker hostage. As police investigate, they find startling links to a series of robberies, all taking place during the Christmas season.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Head in a Bucket
programme.desc: A woman is told by a friend that she was a passenger in a car where she was confronted with a guy's head in a bucket.

programme.title: 72 Hours: The Great Despisers
programme.desc: A 19 year old man comes home one night to discover that his family had all been savagely murdered. Could it be the insurance money and a movie called "The Great Despisers" that motivated the killers to perpetrate such violence?

programme.title: It's A Wonderful Life
programme.desc: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

programme.title: Wardens: Wasted Dummy
programme.desc: This week Warden Lesofski searches out a hunting party that left their elk to rot. While Region 2 Wardens rush into a volatile situation after their decoy is shot from the road.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.

programme.desc: Some who were detained during the Resistance sweep have not reappeared after their release. Lili is taken to a lab run by Sandoval and implanted. Renee tries to help Liam find the missing people.

programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Blue River Murder
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2010 death of Stephanie Roller, a Colorado mother of three who allegedly went for a walk during a blizzard and was later found dead in a nearby river.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death at Cottonwood Creek
programme.desc: Frederick Mueller says while he and his wife were out for a walk near their vacation home, she fell off a cliff while he stopped to take a photo of her. Was it murder or an accident?

programme.title: 48 Hours: Loved to Death
programme.desc: An investigation into the rise of violence surrounding relationship breakups among adolescents, as detailed in the story of Wayland, Massachusetts teen Lauren Astley, whose last encounter with her football player ex-boyfriend proved to be fatal

programme.desc: Attorneys work to get a death row inmate who confessed to a crime he didn't commit out of prison.
